thread.title: Sarsour Calls Trump, Netanyahu Two ‘Bigoted Peas in a Hateful Pod’
thread.title_full: Sarsour Calls Trump, Netanyahu Two ‘Bigoted Peas in a Hateful Pod’

author: Chandler Gill
title: Sarsour Calls Trump, Netanyahu Two ‘Bigoted Peas in a Hateful Pod’
text:
BY: Chandler Gill Follow @chandlergillDC February 16, 2017 7:23 pm 
Linda Sarsour, Womens March organizer and executive director of the Arab American Association, was saying outside the White House on Wednesday that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is a bigot and is not welcome in the United States. 
She also called President Donald Trump a bigot, relating him and Netanyahu as being two "bigoted peas in a hateful pod," Twitchy reported on Thursday. . @lsarsour now in front of the White House: Trump & Netanyahu are two "bigoted peas in a hateful pod." pic.twitter.com/jK6dXjf2Lz 
— Our Revolution (@OurRevolution) February 15, 2017 
Sarsour has become known for her controversial and sometimes contradictory statements. Twitchy noted two tweets in particular that contradict each other. 
In the first tweet, she wrote that two women deserve an "a$$ whippin," and she wished she could "take their vaginas" because "they don't deserve to be women." 
— TheRecoveringLeftist (@recvrngleftist) February 16, 2017 
Then she pinned a tweet that contradicts the first one. "We can disagree & still love each other, unless your disagreement is rooted in my oppression & denial of my humanity and right to exist." 
— Linda Sarsour (@lsarsour) November 11, 2016 

Sarsour has been an outspoken critic of Netanyahu and this has not the first time that she has said something of this stature. She once tweeted that Netanyahu is "a waste of a human being." 

— Linda Sarsour (@lsarsour) October 22, 2015 

In 2012, Sarsour accused the New York Police Department of " manufacturing " terrorism cases that target Muslim-Americans. 
She has also "expressed regret" that Iraqi dictator Osama Bin Laden had been caught because of his positive help towards Palestinians.
